基本字义
● 鍑
fù ㄈㄨˋ
◎ 古代的一种大口锅：“以～煮，安炊之，勿令疾沸。”
Basic meaning
● 鍑
fù ㄈㄨˋ
◎ An ancient big-mouthed pot: "Cook with ~, cook it safely, and don't make it boil."

鍑字的基本解释

鍑
fù
古代的一种大口锅：“以鍑煮，安炊之，勿令疾沸。”

鍑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fù］
［《廣韻》方副切，去宥，非。］
［《廣韻》方六切，入屋，非。］
亦作“鍢1”。
釜属。形制不一。

鍑字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鍑； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1313第20
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?方副切，音富。【說文】本作?。釜大口者。【揚子·方言】釜，自關而西或謂之鍑。【前漢·匈奴傳】多齎鬴鍑薪炭。【註】鍑，音富。釜之大者也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?方六切，音福。義同。◎按正字通云：博古圖，周獸耳鍑，容五斗八升，口徑八寸六分，兩目連環，似釜而口斂，口上載鬲以熟物。漢獸耳鍑，容一斗四升，八合，口徑五寸，兩耳環與周鍑同。鍑似二甌俯仰合，甌邊稍著，上有小口。據此說，鍑當是小口者，說文訓釜大口，未詳考鍑形制故也。

鍑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鍑字的起名意思

暂无。

鍑
Basic explanation of words
鍑
fù
A kind of large-mouth pot in ancient times: "Cook with meat, cook it safely, and don't make it boil."
鍑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fù］
["Guangyun" Fang Fuqie, Quyou, Fei. ]
["Guangyun" square six cuts, enter the house, non. ]
Also known as "Ying 1".
Cauldron. Different forms.
鍑
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鍑; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1313 to 20
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Fang Fuqie, rich in sound. [Said the text] This work?. Those with big mouths. [Yangtze Dialect] Cauldron, from the Guanxi to the west, or so called 鍑. [Previous Han · Xiongnu Biography] A lot of charcoal. 【Note】Yin, Yin Fu. The big one is also the cauldron.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Fang Liu cut, sound blessing. The same meaning. ◎According to the orthographic words: Bogutu, Zhou beast ears, the capacity is five buckets and eight liters, the caliber is eight inches and six points, the two eyes are connected, like a kettle, and the mouth is closed. The earrings of the Han beasts are four liters in one bucket, eight-in-one, and have a diameter of five inches. The two earrings are the same as those of Zhou. The two cups are pitched together like two cups, and the cups are slightly on the side, with a small mouth on the top. According to this, it is said that 鍑 is a small mouth person, and it is said that the literary kettle has a big mouth, and it has not been studied in detail.
